recipes.startdescription: @#mariner.curses.concealer|This curse is concealed.#|The Curse of Misfortune is approaching...@
The Curse of Misfortune is approaching...

recipes.label: Serendipitous Notoriety
recipes.startdescription: My name is mentioned in the wrong company for the wrong reasons. This time, my rising infamy has little to do with me.

recipes.label: Unexpected Dread
recipes.startdescription: Nightmares cling to me like cogwebs.
